description: This file defines a React functional component called LoginPage, which implements a login form with email, password, remember me checkbox, and navigation upon submission. It includes UI elements like logo and styled input fields. It manages form state using React hooks and handles form submission to simulate login behavior.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, prevents default behavior, stores email in localStorage if 'remember' is checked, and navigates to '/animals'.
